title: VueDo
description: My first Vue.js project, a simple to do list with the ability to add, complete and delete tasks.

title: Vue-Giphy
description: A Vue application that retrieves and displays Gifs from the Giphy API. The application allows the user to view trending gifs, select a random gif or search a gif by name.

title: A Vue of the World
description: A college assignment using Vue, retrieves and display information from the REST Countries API. The user can search for information on countries from around the world.

title: College Vue
description: A college assignment using Vue. A user has full CRUD capabailites by sending and receiving various infomation about lecturers, courses and enrolements via a College API

title: Space Escape
description: A video game 'Space Escape' created using the Javascript games engine Phaser. This was a college assignment for a Software project module which was completed over a duration of 6 weeks

title: Film Finder
description: A Flutter app that will take in a user's input and search the movie database API for a film with a matching title. The app has built in error checking in case a result is not found.
